scholarships.title: Gujarat Government Scholarship
scholarships.description: State government scholarship for students studying in Gujarat.
scholarships.eligibility: Gujarat domicile, studying in Gujarat, family income below ₹2 Lakhs
scholarships.applicationProcess: Apply online through Digital Gujarat portal

scholarships.title: Merit Scholarship
scholarships.description: Scholarship for students with excellent academic performance.
scholarships.eligibility: Minimum 80% marks in previous class, family income below ₹3 Lakhs

scholarships.title: Education Loan Information
scholarships.description: Government and private bank education loans for higher studies.
scholarships.eligibility: Admission in recognized institution, Indian citizen, co-applicant required
scholarships.applicationProcess: Apply through Vidya Lakshmi Portal or directly at banks
